'''Comfort Food''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Suleidy's Cure]] on the island of [[Dread Vine's Cove]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Feed the Dread Vine 8 bodies.</big>
